TransactionType.name: Incoming Funds
TransactionType.description: Funds recieved for use on the activity, which can be from an external or internal source.

TransactionType.name: Outgoing Commitment
TransactionType.description: A firm, written obligation from a donor or provider to provide a specified amount of funds, under particular terms and conditions, for specific purposes, for the benefit of the recipient.

TransactionType.name: Disbursement
TransactionType.description: Outgoing funds that are placed at the disposal of a recipient government or organisation, or funds transferred between two separately reported activities.

TransactionType.name: Expenditure
TransactionType.description: Outgoing funds that are spent on goods and services for the activity.
